Container.Name: MakerWorks v2
Container.Overview: MakerWorks v2 is a self-hosted 3D model hub built with Next.js 14, Prisma, and Postgres. The template deploys the web application container from GitHub Container Registry; pair it with any reachable Postgres instance (local container, remote VM, managed service) and map a persistent storage share for uploaded STL/OBJ/3MF assets plus thumbnails.

Config.Name: Web Port
Config.Description: Port the MakerWorks Next.js server listens on

Config.Name: Storage
Config.Description: Persistent directory for uploaded models, covers, and avatars

Config.Name: DATABASE_URL
Config.Description: Postgres connection string (must be reachable from the container)

Config.Name: JWT_SECRET
Config.Description: Secret used to sign user sessions (set to a long random string)

Config.Name: BASE_URL
Config.Description: Public URL users access (used for redirects/cookies)

Config.Name: COOKIE_SECURE
Config.Description: Set to true when BASE_URL is HTTPS so auth cookies are secure

Config.Name: COST_PER_CM3
Config.Description: Cost per cubic centimeter used by print estimator

Config.Name: FIXED_FEE_USD
Config.Description: Fixed service fee (USD) added to every estimate

Config.Name: ADMIN_EMAIL
Config.Description: Email for the bootstrap administrator account

Config.Name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password for the bootstrap administrator (rotated on change)

Config.Name: ADMIN_NAME
Config.Description: Display name for the bootstrap administrator account

Config.Name: DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN
Config.Description: Optional bot token used for Discord announcements

Config.Name: DISCORD_CHANNEL_ID
Config.Description: Discord channel ID used for announcements
